# Innozverse Design System

> A warm, human-centric design language that avoids generic AI/tech aesthetics

**Philosophy**: Prioritize warmth, approachability, and personality over sterile perfection. Design should feel curated by humans, not generated by algorithms.

---

## Color Palette

### Light Mode (Default)

**Warm Neutrals (Stone/Sand Base)**

```css
/* Background - Warm off-white */
--background: 42 15% 97%; /* hsl */
/* #F5F5F0 - Use instead of pure white */

/* Foreground - Deep warm gray */
--foreground: 24 10% 10%; /* hsl */
/* #1A1714 - Rich, not harsh black */

/* Muted - Soft sand */
--muted: 42 20% 92%; /* hsl */
/* #F0EDE8 */

/* Border - Warm border */
--border: 42 15% 88%; /* hsl */
/* #E5E1DC - Subtle warmth */
```

**Accent Colors**

```css
/* Primary - Deep Moss Green */
--primary: 150 40% 35%; /* hsl */
/* #36755B - Nature-inspired, grounded */
--primary-foreground: 0 0% 100%; /* White text on primary */

/* Secondary - Clay/Warm Stone */
--secondary: 20 45% 92%; /* hsl */
/* #F2EBE6 - Earthy warmth */
--secondary-foreground: 24 10% 10%; /* Dark text on secondary */

/* Accent - Warm Beige */
--accent: 30 40% 85%; /* hsl */
/* #E8DDD3 */
--accent-foreground: 24 10% 10%;
```

**Semantic Colors**

```css
/* Destructive - Warm Red */
--destructive: 0 65% 51%; /* hsl */
--destructive-foreground: 0 0% 100%;

/* Muted Foreground - Mid-tone */
--muted-foreground: 25 10% 40%; /* hsl */
```

### Dark Mode

**Warm Charcoal (Not Pure Black)**

```css
/* Background - Warm Espresso */
--background: 20 15% 11%; /* hsl */
/* #1C1917 - Rich, warm darkness */

/* Foreground */
--foreground: 42 15% 97%; /* hsl */

/* Primary - Lighter Moss in Dark */
--primary: 150 40% 45%; /* hsl */

/* Secondary - Warm Dark Stone */
--secondary: 20 20% 18%; /* hsl */
/* #2D2622 */

/* Muted */
--muted: 20 15% 15%; /* hsl */
--muted-foreground: 42 15% 70%; /* hsl */

/* Accent */
--accent: 30 25% 22%; /* hsl */
--accent-foreground: 42 15% 97%;

/* Border */
--border: 20 15% 20%; /* hsl */
```

### Usage Guidelines

- **Never use pure white (#FFFFFF)** - Always use `--background` (warm off-white)
- **Never use pure black (#000000)** - Always use `--foreground` or dark mode background
- **Avoid cold grays** - Stick to warm stone/sand tones
- **Primary color is moss green** - Not blue, not purple. Nature-inspired.

---

## Typography

### Font Families

**Serif (Headings) - Fraunces**

```tsx
import { Fraunces } from 'next/font/google'

const fraunces = Fraunces({
  subsets: ['latin'],
  variable: '--font-fraunces',
  display: 'swap',
})
```

**Sans-Serif (Body) - Plus Jakarta Sans**

```tsx
import { Plus_Jakarta_Sans } from 'next/font/google'

const jakarta = Plus_Jakarta_Sans({
  subsets: ['latin'],
  variable: '--font-jakarta',
  display: 'swap',
})
```

### CSS Configuration

```css
/* Apply fonts */
body {
  font-family: var(--font-jakarta), system-ui, sans-serif;
}

h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
  font-family: var(--font-fraunces), Georgia, serif;
}
```

### Type Scale

**Headings (Serif)**

```css
/* Hero / Display */
.text-display {
  font-size: 5rem; /* 80px */
  font-weight: 700;
  line-height: 1.1;
}

/* H1 */
.text-h1 {
  font-size: 3.75rem; /* 60px */
  font-weight: 700;
  line-height: 1.2;
}

/* H2 */
.text-h2 {
  font-size: 3rem; /* 48px */
  font-weight: 600;
  line-height: 1.25;
}

/* H3 */
.text-h3 {
  font-size: 2.25rem; /* 36px */
  font-weight: 600;
  line-height: 1.3;
}

/* H4 */
.text-h4 {
  font-size: 1.875rem; /* 30px */
  font-weight: 600;
  line-height: 1.35;
}

/* H5 */
.text-h5 {
  font-size: 1.5rem; /* 24px */
  font-weight: 600;
  line-height: 1.4;
}

/* H6 */
.text-h6 {
  font-size: 1.25rem; /* 20px */
  font-weight: 600;
  line-height: 1.4;
}
```

**Body Text (Sans)**

```css
/* Large Body */
.text-xl {
  font-size: 1.25rem; /* 20px */
  line-height: 1.75;
}

/* Regular Body */
.text-base {
  font-size: 1rem; /* 16px */
  line-height: 1.5;
}

/* Small Text */
.text-sm {
  font-size: 0.875rem; /* 14px */
  line-height: 1.5;
}

/* Extra Small */
.text-xs {
  font-size: 0.75rem; /* 12px */
  line-height: 1.5;
}
```

### Font Features

```css
body {
  font-feature-settings: "rlig" 1, "calt" 1;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}
```

### Usage Guidelines

- **Headings**: Always use serif (Fraunces) for personality
- **Body**: Always use sans-serif (Plus Jakarta Sans) for readability
- **Line Height**: Generous for warmth (1.5-1.75 for body)
- **Weight Contrast**: Bold headings (600-700), medium body (400-500)

---

## Spacing & Sizing

### Spacing Scale

```javascript
// Tailwind spacing (rem based)
spacing: {
  '0': '0px',
  'px': '1px',
  '0.5': '0.125rem',  // 2px
  '1': '0.25rem',     // 4px
  '2': '0.5rem',      // 8px
  '3': '0.75rem',     // 12px
  '4': '1rem',        // 16px
  '5': '1.25rem',     // 20px
  '6': '1.5rem',      // 24px
  '8': '2rem',        // 32px
  '10': '2.5rem',     // 40px
  '12': '3rem',       // 48px
  '16': '4rem',       // 64px
  '20': '5rem',       // 80px
  '24': '6rem',       // 96px
}
```

### Common Patterns

```tsx
/* Card padding */
<div className="p-6">  {/* 24px */}

/* Section spacing */
<section className="py-24">  {/* 96px vertical */}

/* Element gaps */
<div className="space-y-8">  {/* 32px between children */}

/* Button spacing */
<Button className="px-6 py-2">  {/* 24px horizontal, 8px vertical */}
```

---

## Border Radius

### Radius Scale

```css
/* Base radius - Larger for friendlier feel */
--radius: 1rem; /* 16px - Base radius */

/* Derived radii */
--radius-lg: 1rem;        /* 16px */
--radius-md: 0.75rem;     /* 12px */
--radius-sm: 0.5rem;      /* 8px */
```

### Tailwind Classes

```javascript
borderRadius: {
  'none': '0',
  'sm': 'calc(var(--radius) - 4px)',    // 12px
  'DEFAULT': 'calc(var(--radius) - 2px)', // 14px
  'md': 'calc(var(--radius) - 2px)',    // 14px
  'lg': 'var(--radius)',                // 16px
  'xl': '1.5rem',                       // 24px
  '2xl': '2rem',                        // 32px
  'full': '9999px',
}
```

### Usage

```tsx
/* Cards - Large radius for organic feel */
<Card className="rounded-2xl">  {/* 32px */}

/* Buttons - Extra large for tactile feel */
<Button className="rounded-xl">  {/* 24px */}

/* Small elements */
<Badge className="rounded-lg">  {/* 16px */}

/* Icons/Avatars */
<Avatar className="rounded-full">
```

### Guidelines

- **Use larger radii** (xl, 2xl) for main components
- **Avoid sharp corners** on interactive elements
- **Consistent rounding** creates cohesion

---

## Shadows & Depth

### Shadow Scale

```css
/* Soft, diffused shadows - No harsh edges */

/* Small - Subtle elevation */
.shadow-sm {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
}

/* Default - Card elevation */
.shadow {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1),
              0 1px 2px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

/* Medium - Hover states */
.shadow-md {
  box-shadow: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1),
              0 2px 4px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

/* Large - Primary elements */
.shadow-lg {
  box-shadow: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1),
              0 4px 6px -4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

/* Extra Large - Modals/Dialogs */
.shadow-xl {
  box-shadow: 0 20px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1),
              0 8px 10px -6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}
```

### Colored Shadows (Primary)

```tsx
/* Button with colored shadow */
<Button className="shadow-lg shadow-primary/20 hover:shadow-xl hover:shadow-primary/30">
  Click Me
</Button>
```

### Usage Patterns

```tsx
/* Cards - Base shadow with hover lift */
<Card className="shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all hover:-translate-y-1">

/* Buttons - Colored shadow for depth */
<Button className="shadow-lg shadow-primary/20">

/* Dropdowns - Large shadow for floating */
<Dropdown className="shadow-xl">
```

### Guidelines

- **Low opacity** (0.05-0.1) for subtlety
- **Colored shadows** on primary actions
- **Hover lift** + shadow increase for interactivity
- **Avoid harsh** black shadows

---

## Components

### Button Component

**Variants**

```tsx
import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'

/* Default - Primary action */
<Button>
  Default Button
</Button>

/* Outline - Secondary action */
<Button variant="outline">
  Outline Button
</Button>

/* Ghost - Tertiary action */
<Button variant="ghost">
  Ghost Button
</Button>

/* Destructive - Delete/Cancel */
<Button variant="destructive">
  Delete
</Button>

/* Secondary - Alternative style */
<Button variant="secondary">
  Secondary
</Button>
```

**Sizes**

```tsx
/* Small */
<Button size="sm">Small</Button>

/* Default */
<Button size="default">Default</Button>

/* Large */
<Button size="lg">Large</Button>

/* Icon only */
<Button size="icon">
  <Icon />
</Button>
```

**Button Features**

- Tactile shadow depth
- Active scale animation (`active:scale-95`)
- Hover lift (`hover:-translate-y-0.5`)
- Colored shadows on primary
- Rounded corners (xl = 24px)

### Card Component

```tsx
import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardDescription, CardContent, CardFooter } from '@/components/ui/card'

<Card>
  <CardHeader>
    <CardTitle>Card Title</CardTitle>
    <CardDescription>Card description here</CardDescription>
  </CardHeader>
  <CardContent>
    Main content
  </CardContent>
  <CardFooter>
    Footer actions
  </CardFooter>
</Card>
```

**Card Features**

- 2xl border radius (32px)
- Shadow with hover lift
- Warm border color
- Transition on hover
- Gradient backgrounds for emphasis

**Card Patterns**

```tsx
/* Basic Card */
<Card className="p-6">

/* Card with gradient */
<Card className="bg-gradient-to-br from-card to-secondary/50">

/* Hover lift card */
<Card className="hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300">

/* Icon + Title Card */
<Card>
  <CardHeader>
    <div className="w-12 h-12 rounded-xl bg-primary/10 flex items-center justify-center mb-4">
      <Icon className="w-6 h-6 text-primary" />
    </div>
    <CardTitle>Title</CardTitle>
    <CardDescription>Description</CardDescription>
  </CardHeader>
</Card>
```

## Textures & Patterns

### Grain Texture Overlay

**CSS**

```css
.grain-texture {
  position: relative;
}

.grain-texture::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 400 400' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.9' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E");
  pointer-events: none;
  z-index: 1;
}
```

**Usage**

```tsx
<section className="grain-texture">
  {/* Content gets subtle grain overlay */}
</section>
```

### Dot Pattern Background

**Tailwind Config**

```javascript
backgroundImage: {
  'dot-pattern': "url(\"data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='20' height='20' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Ccircle cx='2' cy='2' r='1' fill='%23000000' fill-opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E\")",
}
```

**Usage**

```tsx
<section className="bg-dot-pattern">
  {/* Subtle dot texture */}
</section>
```

### Gradient Backgrounds

```tsx
/* Warm gradient overlay */
<div className="bg-gradient-to-br from-secondary/50 via-background to-accent/30">

/* Primary gradient */
<div className="bg-gradient-to-br from-primary/5 to-card">

/* Warm section background */
<section className="bg-gradient-to-br from-primary/5 via-background to-secondary/30">
```

## Animation

### Transitions

**Base Transition**

```css
transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out
```

**Common Animations**

```tsx
/* Hover lift */
<div className="hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300">

/* Active scale (buttons) */
<button className="active:scale-95 transition-all">

/* Fade in */
<div className="opacity-0 animate-in fade-in duration-500">

/* Slide in */
<div className="animate-in slide-in-from-bottom-4 duration-500">
```

### Loading States

```tsx
/* Skeleton loader */
<div className="h-8 w-20 animate-pulse rounded-lg bg-muted" />

/* Spinner (if needed) */
<div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-8 w-8 border-b-2 border-primary" />
```

### Keyframe Animations

```javascript
// Tailwind config
keyframes: {
  "accordion-down": {
    from: { height: "0" },
    to: { height: "var(--radix-accordion-content-height)" },
  },
  "accordion-up": {
    from: { height: "var(--radix-accordion-content-height)" },
    to: { height: "0" },
  },
}
```

## Layout Patterns

### Asymmetric Bento Grid

**Pattern: Mix of 2x2, 1x1, 2x1 cards**

```tsx
<div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
  {/* Large Feature - 2x2 */}
  <Card className="md:col-span-2 md:row-span-2">
    <CardHeader>
      <CardTitle className="text-3xl">Main Feature</CardTitle>
    </CardHeader>
    <CardContent>
      {/* Large content */}
    </CardContent>
  </Card>

  {/* Small Cards - 1x1 */}
  <Card>
    <CardHeader>
      <CardTitle className="text-xl">Feature</CardTitle>
    </CardHeader>
  </Card>

  <Card>
    <CardHeader>
      <CardTitle className="text-xl">Feature</CardTitle>
    </CardHeader>
  </Card>

  {/* Wide Card - 2x1 */}
  <Card className="md:col-span-2">
    <CardHeader>
      <CardTitle className="text-2xl">Wide Feature</CardTitle>
    </CardHeader>
  </Card>
</div>
```

### Container System

```tsx
/* Max-width container */
<div className="container max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">

/* Narrow content */
<div className="max-w-2xl mx-auto">

/* Wide content */
<div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto">
```

### Section Spacing

```tsx
/* Standard section */
<section className="py-24">

/* Hero section */
<section className="min-h-[90vh] flex items-center justify-center">

/* Tight section */
<section className="py-16">
```

## Voice & Tone

### Writing Principles

**Do:**
- ✅ "Tech that feels right" (emotional, human)
- ✅ "Real gear, real discounts" (honest, direct)
- ✅ "Talk to actual humans who actually care" (warm, genuine)
- ✅ "No flashy gimmicks" (anti-hype)
- ✅ "Curated" over "Optimized"

**Don't:**
- ❌ "Cutting-edge technology" (cold, corporate)
- ❌ "AI-powered solutions" (tech jargon)
- ❌ "Synergize your workflow" (buzzwords)
- ❌ "Next-gen performance" (marketing speak)
- ❌ "Optimize" or "Leverage" (corporate)

### Button Copy

**Do:**
- "Browse Collection" (curated)
- "Get Student Access" (inclusive)
- "Continue Shopping" (casual)

**Don't:**
- "Shop Now" (pushy)
- "Buy Today" (sales-y)
- "Limited Time Offer" (scarcity tactics)

---

## Component Examples

### Hero Section Template

```tsx
<section className="grain-texture relative min-h-[90vh] flex items-center justify-center overflow-hidden bg-dot-pattern">
  <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-br from-secondary/50 via-background to-accent/30" />

  <div className="container relative z-10 px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
    <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto text-center space-y-8">
      <h1 className="font-serif text-6xl sm:text-7xl lg:text-8xl font-bold tracking-tight">
        Main Headline
        <span className="block text-primary mt-2">Secondary Line</span>
      </h1>

      <p className="text-xl sm:text-2xl text-muted-foreground max-w-2xl mx-auto leading-relaxed">
        Supporting copy that's warm and human
      </p>

      <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-center pt-4">
        <Button asChild size="lg">
          <Link href="/action">Primary Action</Link>
        </Button>
        <Button asChild variant="outline" size="lg">
          <Link href="/secondary">Secondary Action</Link>
        </Button>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
```

### Feature Card Template

```tsx
<Card className="bg-gradient-to-br from-card to-secondary/50">
  <CardHeader className="space-y-4">
    {/* Icon */}
    <div className="w-16 h-16 rounded-2xl bg-primary/10 flex items-center justify-center">
      <Icon className="w-8 h-8 text-primary" />
    </div>

    <CardTitle className="text-3xl">Feature Title</CardTitle>
    <CardDescription className="text-base">
      Feature description with warm, human copy
    </CardDescription>
  </CardHeader>

  <CardContent>
    {/* Stats or additional content */}
    <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-4 mt-6">
      <div className="space-y-2">
        <div className="text-4xl font-bold text-primary">10-30%</div>
        <div className="text-sm text-muted-foreground">Label</div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </CardContent>
</Card>
```

### Navbar Template

```tsx
<nav className="sticky top-0 z-50 w-full border-b border-border/40 bg-background/95 backdrop-blur supports-[backdrop-filter]:bg-background/60">
  <div className="container flex h-16 max-w-7xl items-center px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
    <div className="flex flex-1 items-center justify-between">
      {/* Logo */}
      <Link href="/" className="flex items-center space-x-2">
        <span className="font-serif text-2xl font-bold text-foreground hover:text-primary transition-colors">
          Brand
        </span>
      </Link>

      {/* Navigation */}
      <div className="hidden md:flex items-center space-x-1">
        <Button asChild variant="ghost" size="sm">
          <Link href="/page">Link</Link>
        </Button>
      </div>

      {/* Actions */}
      <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
        <Button asChild variant="ghost" size="sm">
          <Link href="/login">Sign in</Link>
        </Button>
        <Button asChild size="sm">
          <Link href="/register">Sign up</Link>
        </Button>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</nav>
```

---

## Implementation Checklist

When creating new UI components, ensure:

- [ ] Using warm neutrals (stone/sand), not cold grays
- [ ] Serif fonts for headings
- [ ] Sans-serif for body text
- [ ] Larger border radius (xl, 2xl)
- [ ] Soft shadows with low opacity
- [ ] Grain texture on hero/major sections
- [ ] Gradient backgrounds for depth
- [ ] Hover states with lift animations
- [ ] Human-centric copy (no jargon)
- [ ] Asymmetric layouts when appropriate
- [ ] Colored shadows on primary actions
- [ ] Warm color palette throughout

---

## Quick Reference

**Colors**: Moss Green (#36755B), Sand (#F5F5F0), Espresso (#1C1917)
**Fonts**: Fraunces (serif) + Plus Jakarta Sans (sans)
**Radius**: Large (1-2rem) for organic feel
**Shadows**: Soft, colored on primary
**Tone**: Warm, honest, human - no tech jargon

**Key Principle**: If it looks like it could be generated by AI, rethink it. Add asymmetry, warmth, and personality.
